mapper.select: SELECT pointlog.operated_qq_id AS operated_qq_id,pointlog.operate_type AS operate_type ,pointlog.operate_point AS operate_point, pointlog.description AS description ,pointlog.operate_date AS operate_date ,pointlog.img AS img FROM pointlog WHERE pointlog.operated_qq_id = #{qq} AND pointlog.state = 1 ORDER BY operate_date DESC;
